front.title: Reverse DNS in IPv6 for Internet Service Providers

abstract.t: In IPv4, Internet Service Providers (ISPs) commonly provide IN-ADDR.ARPA. information for their customers by prepopulating the zonewith one PTR record for every available address. This practice doesnot scale in IPv6. This document analyzes different approaches forISPs to manage the ip6.arpa zone for IPv6 address space assigned tomany customers.
